    fry9c

    R package for interacting with the Federal Reserve Consolidated Financial Statements for Holding Companies (FR Y-9c)

    Data

    The Holding Company Names come from here

    The Holding Comapny Data is downloaded from here

    To get the data definitions from the Consolidated Financial Statements for Holding Companies go here
